ComicInfo.Summary:
First issue of the classic British horror anthology comic which came with free plastic 'Dracula fangs' attached to the cover with tape.
Scream was a 32-page weekly comic that lasted only 15 issues before being merged with the Eagle (although four Scream Holiday Specials followed between 1985 and 1988 and a final Spinechillers special in 1989).
